title: Hitman - Sniper Challenge (Multi7) RePack By R.G Revenants NZupl
description:
GENERAL INFORMATION:
Released: 2012
Genre: Action  TPS  TechDemo
Developer: IO Interactive
Publisher: SQUARE ENIX / Eidos Interactive
Publication Type: RePack
Platform: PC
Game Version: 1.0.364.0
Language: Russian / English / German / French / Spanish / Italian / Polish
Sound language: Russian / English / German / French / Spanish / italian / Polish
Medicine: SKiDROW

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
Operating system: Windows 7 SP1 / Windows Vista SP2 / Windows XP SP3
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.6 GHz / AMD Phenom X3 8750
RAM: 2 GB
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 / ATI Radeon HD 3850 - 512 MB
Sound device: compatible with DirectX
Hard disk space: 1.61 GB

DESCRIPTION:
Hitman: Sniper Challenge - a separate mini-game engine, showing the possibility of a new studio IO Interactive - Glacier 2. You will find a separate, unique task to eliminate the boss of a large corporation. Richard Strong, Jr., Director of Stallion Armaments, arrived at the party, which would be his last. Prove that you have no equal in the ability to hide the bodies of defeated guards. Eliminate skilled bodyguards to get to the main target, and find the most efficient way to execute a contract! Sniper Challenge feature is that all of the improvements, bonuses and achievements will be transferred to the Hitman:
